src.gui
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  src.gui.Controller

public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

Facade between the GUI and the domain layer.

Author:
Darren Watts date 11/11/07

getShopkeeperAround

public Enemy getShopkeeperAround(int row,
                                 int col)
Checks to see whether there is a shopkeeper guarding the store at the given location. If there is, it will return the enemy object that is the shopkeeper. Otherwise, it will return null.

Parameters:
row - int : row of the shop
col - int : column of the shop
Returns:
Enemy : The shopkeeper. Null if there isn't one.
